Reviews.Content: The picture and audio are good enough, but the TV itself is very sluggish. It takes forever to bring up the Netflix app, which is primarily why I use it. Once Netflix is running, everything is fine, but it can seriously take 2-3 minutes from the time I turn the power on until I'm in the Netflix browser.Also, on two or three separate occasions, the TV has completely stopped responding to the remote AND the buttons on the side panel. I had to unplug it and plug it back in for it to work again.Overall, I wish I had bought something else.

Reviews.Title: vizio 42 inch smart tv
Reviews.Author: sharon waugh
Reviews.Content: this tv is one of the best investment  I have made in a long time i will be sure to tell all my family and friends thank you

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Erich Grunkemeyer
Reviews.Content: I'm happy with this TV. It has its few minor problems like freezing every once in awhile. Or taking forever to do things sometimes. But every TV has little problems. The picture looks good. The apps are convenient and it has enough HDMI outlets. The only real complaint I have is I wish the controller was bigger. But I got over it.

Reviews.Title: vizio tv
Reviews.Author: mike willey
Reviews.Content: second vizio i bought their great and priced right.works as described. i would surely reccomend this brand of tv to anyone!

Reviews.Title: vizio
Reviews.Author: joyce Davis
Reviews.Content: I. Love this.  Tv . .  ITS THE only brand name in tv's that I will buy l realize the color isNot as good as my other  Vizio, however for 268  give or take a dollar ,it's wonderful!  And l trulyEnjoy it!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Author: Marie E. Larry "rodeo1953"

Reviews.Title: pass this one up

Reviews.Content: had the tv for 11 months worked well for about 10 months then started to lose picture . it would play sometimes and not play at others. today it has only sound and no picture. very disappointing. I will never buy a viore product again!

Reviews.Title: Nice Buy
Reviews.Author: Mark E. Langman
Reviews.Content: Great TV this is my first smart TV how very cool worked great right out of the Box! Sound volume is good which was one of my concerns.

Reviews.Title: Great $300 TV, but the apps are SLOOOOOOW!
Reviews.Author: Jesse M. Jones "Keep it sustainable!"
Reviews.Content: The TV functions great for the broadcast functions, but loading apps (like Netflix) is VERY slow. - When you push the Netflix button, you have to wait 10-15 seconds before a window pops up over the image, asking you to press "OK" to confirm you want to load Netflix. - Then you wait another 10-20 seconds for Netflix to open up, and it asks you if you want the regular Netflix experience, or "Netflix just for Kids" and have you make a selection. - Finally, about 45-60 seconds after you first asked the TV to load Netflix, you can view your queue and pick a movie.Once you're in your queue and browsing movies, it's pretty reasonable, but getting there takes MUCH longer than I'd hoped.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV at an awesome price.
Reviews.Author: Gianna
Reviews.Content: I have a HDTV 1080 for over 5 years and I purchased this TV which is a HDTV 720. I cant tell the difference! Great picture, great sound! I hardly turn it up because it is really loud. APPS are great, connected by WIFI easily and I'm able to watch netflix streaming directly to my TV.

Reviews.Title: Problem with computer part ot TV
Reviews.Author: GizmoGuy
Reviews.Content: This TV worked for about 3 1/2  months, then died suddenly. I think the computer part is not booting up. Vizio support told me how to reboot computer, but this did not work. They will not replace TV because it is past 90 days. Waiting to see if they will repair it. I have heard of others having problems with this. Seems the TV is OK, but the computer part is the weak link. Buyer beware.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price Apps are so-so
Reviews.Author: Paul Colella
Reviews.Content: I've had my TV for about 3 months and it has worked perfectly the whole time. The web apps are kind of dumb/slow but since I have an xbox I run everything through that instead. I would definitely recommend it as an inexpensive alternative which looks just as good.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money
Reviews.Author: NATALIE
Reviews.Content: I bought this smart TV because of the price and the apps. I like the TV for the most part, but a lot of the apps freeze and don't work properly. It takes forever to connect and the remote makes no sense. There should have been a full keyboard remote or something because of all the typing you have to do.

Reviews.Title: Bad product

Reviews.Content: This smart tv sucks. The wifi drags even with strong signal. Dont bother with hulu and youtibe, lots of skipping. It just sucks...smart tv my ass. Want to return this peace of crap.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: onebigboy
Reviews.Content: Purchased for guest bedroom, WiFi works great - easy set up for Netflix and Hulu Plus!  Sound is better then most, speakers shoot downward, but get plenty loud for a 10 x 12 bedroom.  Picture Response Time is 8.5ms and there is some picture studder, but not really noticeable from far away.  TV was delivered by FedEx, way Breyer than the last company that delivered my shattered 55" Plasma!  Great Job!

Reviews.Title: Good overall
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I was shopping for a "basic" 32" 720p Smart TV for the bar area in my home. Since I have had a Vizio E322VL for two years, and am happy with it, I put Vizio at the top of my list.  I ended up purchasing the E322AR at another store (think "Bullseye") for the same price as Amazon.com.  After getting it home and setting it up, and using it for about a week now, here are my impressions.+ PROS ++ Picture is great, with lots of adjustments+ Controls and menu are relatively simple+ Pretty good amount of apps to choose from..although there could be a few more+ One of the only 720p 32" Smart TVs on the market- CONS -- Sound is tinny and empty- VIA App interface is sluggish; way more so than my older E322VLSo ultimately, I am comparing this model to the E322VL that I have had for two years. They are essentially the same TV, except the E322VL is full HD.  My main complaint about the E322AR is how sluggish the VIA app interface is. In fact, you really need to wait 30+ seconds after turning the TV on in order to even use the VIA apps, or else the entire app interface tends to freeze up like an old computer!  This is quite interesting, because my E322VL is much more responsive.Other than that, I am satisfied with the model, especially given the price.  Unless the tinny sound is a deal-breaker for you, this is a great basic Smart TV option. I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Choice
Reviews.Author: Pat H "Pat H"
Reviews.Content: I did a great deal of research before I made this purchase just so I understood the product.  I wanted to get the most for my money.  The 42" was a bit larger than I had planned, but I got the internet version in addition to the HD for very little more money.  It's only 60Hz and many reviewers said you need the 120 to get a faster speed, but I don't notice a problem with viewing the football games . . . baseball is coming soon.  We'll see.  It took some time to adjust the color the way I wanted it but with perseverence I got it just right!  Some people complained about the audio:  I think it's awesome!  The only problem we had was in the setup:  The manual wasn't really clear, but a 10 minute call to Vizio customer support took care of that.  They were terrific!  This is the second Vizio TV we have purchased and I must say I made a good choice!Pat HoughtonAthol, MA

Reviews.Title: Good TV (old title -- I wish Amazon offered free return shipping)
Reviews.Author: G. Ling "G"
Reviews.Content: As always, Amazon offers the first customer service and gives me a free return after I explained about the faults I found in this TV.HOWEVER, soon I discover the wonder of Youtube Pair TV feature, which I can use an android phone to control the playback of youtube video on the vizio TV. Google saved the day! It is so useful!After much consideration, I decide to keep the TV. I am starting to like this TV set despite my original reaction to it. I also changed my rating from 3 to 4 stars. Hope it helps.----- below is the original review -----After using it for 2 weeks, I wish I had the luxury to return it for free. But since I don't I will have to keep it.Pros:- VGA port, not many new TVs have it.- 3 HDMI ports- Youtube app (which Roku doesn't have any more) (this is a differentiating feature!)- Overall good TVCons:- Takes 25 seconds to boot (from pressing power button on remote, to seeing TV picture on the set). I mean, come on. This is supposed to be a TV, not a Microsoft Windows PC.- The apps are very limited. I'd rather buy a dumb TV paired with Ruku- All apps are poorly built (with exception of Vudu). Since Vizio is abandoning Yahoo for Google, I feel I won't see much improvement on this.Overall, for $270 before tax, I can learn to live with its flaws.-

Reviews.Title: Pleasantly surprised with how easy it was to set up.
Reviews.Author: Sheryal MacArthur
Reviews.Content: You don't just plug in a TV anymore.  That being said, this one was almost that easy and we were so pleasantly surprised that it took only minutes using the easy start guide to connect this one to the internet and start using Netflix. This TV was for our guest room.  Our experience with setting up our first HDTV took several days so we were really happy with how easy this was.  We did not have to contact any customer service or support.  The picture and sound are great.  It was also the lowest priced TV of its size that we found after quite a bit of comparison shopping both in stores and online.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Jason K.
Reviews.Content: Very nice TV for only 280 bucks. 4 stars, only reason its not a 5 is because its not compatible with the Internet apps qwerty keyboard remote. I hate using remotes to type letters. Hopefully in the future Vizio will make a compatible one for it.

Reviews.Title: Nice tv
Reviews.Author: burm
Reviews.Content: We have had the tv for a little over a month now. We like it so far. My son is a big Netflix user so after school he has taken over the tv. The only complaint I would have as with two other Vizio TVs we have, is it seems to take a long time for the tv to start up. Very minor problem. I would recommend the tv for sure.

Then one day it was completely dead.  The hardest part was putting the old set back in its place.Update 2/26/13 - Replaced this set with a Samsung - much better picture.  Amazon's service was more than awesome!

Reviews.Title: this tv is great i love it i will tell a friend

Reviews.Content: thanks it came on time and look great plays great i am very happy i will tell a friend like new

Reviews.Title: in love

Reviews.Content: what can i sy i lol i lovr thid tv. the screen is huge. i deff recommd this item to anymoec

Reviews.Content: The TV is great, I have several Vizio TVs, but this is my first Wireless TV. I would send it back however we bought it for the TV only, I just liked the idea of having the weather and FB on tap from the TV.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It's not special or anything, but it works.  The picture looks nice.  It's a little slow navigating the menu, but I didn't buy it for the menu, I bought it to watch stuff, and it does that quite well.  Great product for the price.

Reviews.Content: Watched the Super Bowl & loved it. Haven't dabbled in WWW Apps yet, but they come up fine. Be prepared with HDMI cable, as there's no comparison to other wiring options insofar as quality.Love the sound, much better than our old tube set.

Reviews.Content: I got this for my bedroom. It is a great size and has an amazing picture quality. We do not have cable in the bedroom. We just use netflix or watch DVDs on it. It is an awesome TV. Very happy!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Moe Nawaz
Reviews.Content: I have been looking for a decently sized TV that would fit in a small dorm room, be able to keep up with all my gaming/internet usage and still deliver at a high definition quality. I was a little upset that the TV wasn't in 1080p but it's a great TV regardless in every sense. Took a few minutes to put on the mount and then set up, the remote seems to work with no issues at all for me, and everything is easy to use and find.I'll try to update this rating but for now I love it!

Reviews.Title: Not Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Mickyd
Reviews.Content: Our first Vizio was purchased almost 10 years ago and we still love it.  We purchsed another Vizio (larger screen with Apps) last fall and especially love having the WiFi built in. No extra equipment is needed to watch movies, etc.  We purchased this smaller one with Apps for the bedroom last month. The only negative I have is the sleep timer isn't convenient. You have to go into the menu to see the sleep timer and it only allows you to set by 1/2 hour increments. It would be nice if the was sleep timer button was directly on the remote and could be set by 15 min increments.

Reviews.Title: So Far So Good
Reviews.Author: Lucille P. Sparacio "Italian Mama"
Reviews.Content: I have just purchased Vizio (1 week ago) and so far I am quite happy with item.  It is a lot of 'bang for your buck'.

Reviews.Title: awesome tv great price
Reviews.Author: Robert Blais
Reviews.Content: I bought my first Vizio because I became frustrated with the Sony 42 inch i bought, because of the only two hdmi ports these have 4, the picture is awesome, they went from an unknown to a recognized brand for a reason

Reviews.Title: Great picture and amazing price.
Reviews.Author: tim
Reviews.Content: This is a perfect TV for my bedroom. The picture is clear and hooking it to the net is a breeze. I had a issue with the remote working on and off. I called the customer service and they told me out to reset it, works great now. The pre-installed applications do take a little while to load and tv takes a bit to turn on, but not a deal breaker.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Awesome
Reviews.Author: Marcus
Reviews.Content: So i just got my tv this afternoon and so far I love it! The picture and sound are both great, no problems with it at all so far. The only reason that I didnt rate it five stars is because the base is really flimsy compared to most others. I mean, it holds up fine but it's just flimsy and bends easily. Oh and one other problem I've had so far is with Netflix. It was fine at first but after a while I got a message saying that it couldn't connect to Netflix but I selected ok and resumed then it buffered a couple times and the picture got a little crappy, which really just sounds like my wi-fi. I will be editing this review or writing a new one later on down the road on how it is holding up.Well it's been a couple of weeks since I got the TV and just thought I would update my review. I had originally rated the TV 4 stars but changed it to 3 because a lot of times now when I try to use the apps like Netflix, it will say could not connect to Netflix and then freezes. When this happens none of the buttons of the remote or TV will work. I have to unplug the TV and plug it back in to unfreeze it.

Reviews.Title: hard to navigate
Reviews.Author: darren charny
Reviews.Content: internet in its pure form, is hard to find on this device.  and the remote no matter where placed or aimed, is very un responsive.  kind of upset with price of device

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Cmooney
Reviews.Content: Great picture but if you have never watched a 3d tv, be prepared. It looks different. Kinda like it was filmed with a camcorder. Everything is diffeerent, but i guess thats the 3d look. I dont mean wearng 3d glasses, just watching it in normal mode,

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: C Stevens
Reviews.Content: I was mulling over a tv purchase for a few months and this was always at the top of my list because of the positive reviews on here along with my positive experiences with Vizio.  I wish I would have spent less time mulling and more time enjoying this tv because it is amazing!  It has everything I was looking for: great picture, built-in wifi, netflix, amazon prime, multiple hdmi ports.  This tv is worth twice what they're asking so if you're on the fence about it, get it you won't be disappointed!

Reviews.Title: Vizio
Reviews.Author: Al Graziano
Reviews.Content: I am happy with the TV- except when turning the TV on- it takes a minute or so before it turns on and it always states that it is retriving information although I have everything set up the to open to the same settings.

Reviews.Title: more than expected
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We actually purchased this tv to use as an extra large computer monitor but liked it so well we replaced the old tv instead.  We never knew what we had been missing with our cable package until we got this.  My husband was able to get it easily installed.  We have a trial membership in Amazon Prime and have been trying the movies with it which is very easy to do.I do wish that the remote was larger and had more room between the number buttons.  We have not been able to get our old gigantic universal remote to work with it yet.  I do like the separate buttons for Amazon Prime, Netflix, and M-Go.I am also used to the tv coming instantly on and there is a bit of a lag with this one but probably due to everything needed to be configured.

Reviews.Title: Had Higher Hopes
Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: Screen looks great.The remote is awful. It's one of those remotes where you need to apply extra pressure to press the buttons after hearing a clicking sound. I didn't know they still make these type of buttons. Hmm, strange.The wifi frequently will not work until I unplug the TV and try again.Some of the user interfaces for the apps are very poorly designed. The YouTube app make browsing your YouTube profile a complete pain in the ass. Netflix is alright though.Other than that, it's good enough for me once you get over these few annoyances and get used to the crappy user experience of the apps.

Reviews.Title: nice TV
Reviews.Author: Waterfall2
Reviews.Content: My son picked this out for me. Nice size--good picture. The apps for Pandora, Amazon, and streaming videos are nice. Visios are good products for the price--have a little slowness when first turned on--but no big deal.  Nice sturdy base.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal on a Smart TV
Reviews.Author: William Stepp
Reviews.Content: HIghly recommend this affordable Vizio...... 42" was plenty big for us, setup was a breeze.  Yahoo apps are just ok, but intuitive and easy to use.  I'm looking forward to upgrading to the 60" soon!

Reviews.Title: vizo 42 inch tv
Reviews.Author: Betsy Bowman
Reviews.Content: we love our new tv!  pictures really great and fit into our room great!  not much more i can say

Reviews.Title: Internet TV is a little slow
Reviews.Author: Christopher D. Rogers
Reviews.Content: I got this TV because of the wi-fi and once I got a signal booster to maintain max signal strength to the tv, it works fine. Initial set-up was easy and the apps are great, but if the tv is too far, (router downstairs, tv upstairs) then it's not so hot.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: J. Le
Reviews.Content: This TV is great! the shipping was solid as well, no dents or anything. Great picture and sound, the internet connection is so much better with ethernet, and while the included apps are slow to open, it's a lot better than not having them.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!!!
Reviews.Author: Krista Augustinovich
Reviews.Content: This was a great price and great rated product!! Picture quality is great and easy internet access.  My nephew loves it and is thrilled to play call of duty on it.  We have had a couple of  Vizio's over the years and have yet to have an issue.  Amazon is so good about fast delivery and free shipping that we had a very positive experience.  This is the second TV in 2 years we bought online from Amazon and have nothing but good things to say.

Reviews.Title: awsome
Reviews.Author: Gregory P. Horton "gungho22"
Reviews.Content: we luv the smart tv. its our first one and we now dont like our 50" because it is a regular hdtv.

Reviews.Title: great tv for price
Reviews.Author: duane wesche
Reviews.Content: wonderful tv  great picture, clarity and color shipped fast, not hard to set upworks well with ATT uverse.  would buy another

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: J. Ward
Reviews.Content: This is my sons video game TV. We use it as an alternate TV on the opposite side of our living room space. It looks great for video games and TV. The apps that I use work well and I'm thankful for those services at this price point. I have this across the room from a Samsung PN59D7000 and this holds up well in the same space. At times we view the same content on both TV's and the screen on this is can almost achieve the same look with normal cable content. This is a great TV for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great Value at $398 Delivered!
Reviews.Author: David Wacker
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for about 6 weeks now. The initial setup was a breeze, no issues connecting to the wireless network. The picture quality is excellent. The sound is even surprisingly good. I love the built-in Smart technology and various Apps. As an Amazon Prime member, it's very convenient to access tv shows and movies with an Amazon button as part of the remote! (as well as Netflix and Vudu)It took me a little while to dial in all the video settings as the factory defaults are less than desirable. But, at this point I am very pleased and would recommend this TV highly for the value received.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it
Reviews.Author: Andrea Rubano
Reviews.Content: We love this tv.  It is very reasonably priced, and has a lot to offer for the money.  I previously owned a Vizio tv, and can vouch that their customer service is absolutely top notch .

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Ola
Reviews.Content: i had to change my wifi password to numbers only for setup but otherwise no issues. had it for about a month now.

Reviews.Title: Bad TV after 6 months
Reviews.Author: Klv
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV in June and in late November it stopped turning on.  We called Vizio and they apparently were going to order the part Monday morning and the TV should have been fixed by Friday (one week from it breaking).  However, they wrote down the wrong model number and the wrong telephone number, so when I called to check up on the status of a replacement part 4 days later, they informed me that they had left me messages with me regarding needing the correct number.  Since they had the wrong number I never got these messages.  They then said they were ordering a part (they assumed it was the correct part, since no one ever came to our home to diagnose), and that it should be here the following Wednesday (now going one 1.5 weeks).  I called that Wed and the part had just shipped and they informed me it would be 3-5 business days before the repair guy would get it, so now going on 2 weeks until part actually gets here then we will have to schedule repair, so going on 3 weeks now (2 weeks after it was supposed to be fixed).  After numerous calls to Vizio and asking them to expedite the part since the original problem (wrong numbers) were not our fault, they basically told us there was nothing they could do (i.e. no overnighting the part, etc).  We are extremely dissatisified and will not be buying a Vizio tv again.  Good luck to you if you ever have problems.

Reviews.Title: great purchase
Reviews.Author: Aaron Childs
Reviews.Content: My brother helped me pick this tv out. It was a great price for the product. It is cool that I do not have cable just internet and can watch and do so much useing the tv.

Reviews.Title: Only one thing I wish it would do...
Reviews.Author: Rona B
Reviews.Content: This TV is spectacular, compared to what we were living with before (a huge, 1990s console big screen). Picture is great. The fact that I can browse YouTube and Vimeo and Hulu is freaking fantastically futuristic!! I only wish it had a browser, so we could watch things on news channels or Comedy Central.com, etc.

Reviews.Title: Vizio SmartTV
Reviews.Author: L. Green
Reviews.Content: See recent update comment!!!!  Review update:  After hooking up and getting all the kinks worked out I am downgrading my review for one big reason. This TV contains apps that are not even compatible with the TVs technology.  YouTube WILL NOT play on this TV yet is one of the touted apps as well as the Web Videos app.  Those cant play either because the technologies for buffering arent compatible.  There is no way these functioned properly at Vizio during testing. If you go to Google and search this you will see stream after stream of discussion about Vizio Smart Tvs and how none of them, high or low end will play You Tube properly. This has been a huge complaint before they ever MADE my TV let alone the time I purchased it yet they did nothing about it. ~ Just took it out of the box and got it hooked up.  Apps are loaded, wi-fi is firing and this TV is wildly exceeding my expectations given I got this at a rock bottom price. Will update if I have any issues going forward but so far, loving it and its my main TV in my living room and the sound and picture are great.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Jacob Sigal "Jake Sigal"
Reviews.Content: I used this in my basement and it's a great TV for working out.one thing you should know is that if you use the Composite (yellow/red/blue) cable to connect your cable box or other non digital source, you have to use the "AV" input. If you select Composite input it will show up with out color which is a little confusing. (note that this TV only has one analog input, other than the coax input)... the composite and component input are combined.however for the money this TV rocks.The apps are OK, slower than what consumers typically expect from their mobile phones, but once you get a radio station on TuneIn or a movie on Netflix, it's great.Set up is pretty easy, no issues there and the picture quality is great for the money. Size is perfect for using with workout videos

Reviews.Title: Pleasantly Surprised
Reviews.Author: santadaddy
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv because my daughter was due for a new one in her room. She still had a "jlo", you know, the ones with big bulky backs. But anyways it was time to upgrade, after weeks of searching, I found this vizio on Amazon, everything I was looking for! And specialy th price. Now she enjoys watching her favorite videos movies and shows from YouTube and Netflix directly from th set, no more... ( dad can I barrow phone!) I must say that for price I was not expecting much but Wow.

Reviews.Title: Nice tv
Reviews.Author: gary rohland
Reviews.Content: Very nice tv.  Love the Netflix built in.  A little hard to set up until you find out how to pull up the key pad to type in letters & numbers.

Reviews.Title: Bought used from Warehouse deals. 9/10 condition to factory. cept controller looks dirty. No biggy. it Works perfect.
Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: I was running low on funds so I decided to buy used. I'm glad I did. It was a risk that I feel much safer doing from now on.It was a display model. I had to reset the settings, but other than that, everything was as if it was out of the box. even the plastic was on it. stickers and everything put back on. Box looked like it went through the pitts of Mordor and back, but that was prob due to Fedex shipping and Christmas holiday combined. It was delivered 2 days earlier than the given date which was another plus.As said before, except for the controller coming with fingerprints all over it, and it missing the original batteries, this thing was well worth the discount for getting it used.Now for the TV. So far I havent gotten it connected to the internet. It does take a little bit to learn it, and the Zoom/wide screen/pan mode does seem a little lacking. I can't seem to get a good picture on my Xbox. Maybe I will figure it out later.It comes with some preset internet apps, and the instructions don't go much into the internet troubleshooting. It instead gives you the online place to go for question. Thats good because I usually take the intructions and toss them out the window, and use the internet anyways.That's pretty much it. If I find anything in need of addressing, I'll revise the post.

Reviews.Title: This product is awesome! Working well so far for me :)
Reviews.Author: Ellese L.
Reviews.Content: I love the product. I was in the market for a new tv that was able to connect to wi-fi and have internet apps. For the price and the amount of time it took to get to me, I am very happy!

Reviews.Title: Vizio E322AR 32" Flat Screen TV
Reviews.Author: lermos7
Reviews.Content: I love the color on my new Vizio E322AR 32" TV. I'm also crazy about the internet apps just need a web browser to go with it.

Reviews.Title: wow how sharp.
Reviews.Author: W.B.Logan
Reviews.Content: This set is a great buy. its like watching a black and white set , for years then seeing what you have not seen or heard before, get this one and in 1080p what a big change. The color the sound  you can read the tats on the players now. We also got a sound bar to go with this set. OH my what a set up ,

Reviews.Author: steph
Reviews.Content: This TV is a great size for a bedroom, and the internet apps make it one of the most convenient TV's around.  It's super easy to set up and navigate and I wonder how I've been living so long without it!

Reviews.Title: Great Birthday Present
Reviews.Author: Linda G. Hill
Reviews.Content: Love this TV.  We bought it for our sunroom and have hung it on the wall.  The sound is almost as good as our big screen which is routed through a home theater system.  The picture is excellent.  I can get on line on the TV and lots of apps are available.  Hanging the TV was easy.  We bought a cheetah wall rack and it fit and went up with no problems.  The TV is energy star rated which is important to us.  My only complaint is that it takes a bit of time to power up.  Our big screen powers up almost as fast as my laptop.  The TV is a great value for the money.  Would recommend this TV to a friend with no hesitation.

Reviews.Title: Vizo 32- inch
Reviews.Author: jerry erickson
Reviews.Content: just what I needed size is just right great price was good too Fits my bed room just right thanks

Reviews.Title: Perfect for what I needed
Reviews.Author: katchatiger
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a very basic internet accessible tv that was not huge and did not cost a ton of money.This has been perfect so far! I only use it for netflix and hulu plus (subscription services) but the picture is good and it was worth worth the cost.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Frederick W. Ebbrecht
Reviews.Content: I'm a Vizio fan.  This is my second Vizio LCD, my first being the 47" 1080p-Hooked up to the  Blu-Ray in the family room ...gorgeous picture!I compared side by side in a major store with two other brands and to my eye the Vizio was as good as the top branded, much more expensive sets.  I also like the fact that they are a Ca. based Co., with some of the parts made here in the USA-Not certain if it assembled here or not.  My first LCD just crapped out, it was 8 yrs old and a Westinghouse....steer clear!  The 47" Vizio is 7 years old and going strong, I expect the same from this 32".  This 32" is 720p, just fine for my bedroom where we just watch and stream  apps.  This 32" has a great picture and the apps are easy to set up out of box with wifi ...and with the great price it was an easy choice.  You won't be sorry.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: This TV was a great addition to our house! We love the internet apps, but you do have to pay in for use of the apps (ie. for the netflix and hulu subscriptions, purchases on amazon, and music). Also it said that it came with Pandora, but it came with Rhapsody instead which was a dissapointment.Also, the movies and shows downloaded from the internet apps take quite awhile to download and sometimes quit unexpectedly. Not sure if that is our internet connection or the TV, but our computers don't have that problems so we think it is probably the TV.The picture quality is very good - not amazing, but more than acceptable for the price.  All in all, we are pleased with the purchase and use it daily.

Reviews.Title: Great. Better than expected. Doesn't take that long to start. Netflix works perfectly.
Reviews.Author: tay
Reviews.Content: Don't notice any of the other problems that other reviews mentioned. Extremely satisfied for the price. Very happy. Would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Vizio HDTV
Reviews.Author: K. Corriher "TV junkie"
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because I love my new tv!! I haven't had any issues that couldn't be corrected thru troubleshooting...I really love having netflix on my tv...it's a great tv for everyone!!!

Reviews.Title: Love it

The apps work great and flawless. The picture is super nice. I prob could get the wifi to work if I tried but I'm lazy.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Taryn
Reviews.Content: I love our new family room tv! Watching Netflix with the family is wonderful. The remote and apps are easy to use. The color on the tv is great. The price was reasonable, too!

Reviews.Title: Great buy, amazing TV!
Reviews.Author: Noshkanok "Greg"
Reviews.Content: We've had our Vizio E322AR for a couple of weeks now, and we're still amazed at its capabilities. As other reviews state, it will smell like fresh electronics for about 3 days after its first use. This is from leftover residue from the manufacturing process, and it's harmless.It does take about 10-15 seconds to boot up after you press the power button, which seems like a long time. Keep in mind it has to actually boot up, and it doesn't have much processing power. It then must connect to your router before you can access the apps. I don't mind any of this at all because our old tube screen couldn't do a fraction of what this TV can.The picture is great, as with most LCD screens. HD channels look amazing. Sound quality is superb. Deep, rich lows and clear highs all through its range. It won't shake your walls with bass, of course, but it sounds fantastic.The apps are mostly useless, but the exceptions are, well, exceptionally useful. We use Netflix, Pandora, The Weather Channel, and Media apps the most. The Weather Channel app allows us to personalize our locations so we can check our local weather from the couch while watching TV or movies or listening to music. Very cool. You can also set more locations, I think around 5, so you can check the weather where your relatives are, or your favorite ski resort, or park, or whatever. The Media app, however, is the bees knees. It allows us to connect through wi-fi to our media libraries on our computer. All the music, movies, tv-shows we have are accessible through the tv. Certain aspect ratios aren't supported, but 90% of the AVI files I have work. The others we can watch through the Xbox.Of course the TV also has the full range of adjustability options, such as picture (with settings for sports, movies, news, even backlight and automatic ambient light compensation settings), audio, closed captioning, sleep timer.Apps appear in a row at the bottom of the screen and can be added, deleted, or moved around easily. While using an app, you have the option of adjusting the screen ratio on the right 2/3 of the screen for optimum viewing while using the app. I mean it's just silly the amount of engineering went into this thing.The only downside: Only one USB camera is currently compatible with Vizio TVs, and it's hard to find. If you plan on using the Skype app (also very cool), find one of those cameras (Vizio XCV100). We have Xbox Kinect so we don't need it. That's it. All in all, a marvelous piece of technology and a great buy. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Great TV with wonderful picture and Sound
Reviews.Author: Donald L. Miller
Reviews.Content: I love this TV.  The only problem I find is that there are porblems with the apps attached to this product.I bought this TV for my bedroom for the internet apps and a blue ray DVD player with apps for my HD tv in the living room.  I have more problems viewing programs on the Vizio tv.  I contacted customer service and they say its my internet.  I go to the living room and watch the same program, using the same app, on my dvd player manufactured by another company and I have no problems.I realized that the apps on my wonderful TV are powered by Yahoo.  Now it all makes sense.  The TV is a great purchase and all the problems are due to Yahoo.  Yahoo sucks and it's run by idiots.  Can anyone remember Musicmatch Jukebox and how Yahoo screwed it up?I can watch Amazon streams with on one problem - I can add shows to my watchlist for Amazon on my computer and DVD player in different rooms but I can't access the watchlist on my Vizio TV in my bedroom (Thanks Yahoo).  Also the menu for Amazon Streaming sucks on my TV (Thanks Yahoo).  I go to my Sony Blue-Ray player in the living room and zip through to the programs I want to see (Thanks Sony).  I can watch Amazon Streaming (which I think is great by the way) but Hulu Plus doesn't play well at all on my Vizio TV.  Today I tried Hulu Plus on my Vizio and the program was choppy and the sound and picture dragged.  I turned off my TV and went to my Blue Ray Player in the living room and have no problem watching Hulu Plus (and thanks Sony for the three month Hulu Plus Trial Membership - I love it)Don't get me wrong, Vizio makes a wonderful TV but they need to partner with another company.  If I had known that Vizio was using Yahoo I make not have bought this set.  I'm hoping that future that Yahoo gets its act together but if it's any indication by the way their Yahoo Email works then we're all in trouble.  Are you listening Vizio?  Yahoo is bringing your product down!  I'm currently working on an MBA and from all indication from my education - Vizio is riding a sinking Ship!

Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: Nice TV except it takes about thirty  seconds to warm up and see the screen when you turn it on.

Reviews.Title: BAD PICTURE
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The picture quality of this TV is very very poor. I spent 2 days of messing around to try to improve it and then when and bought a Samsung. If you want dull color and poor diffention then this is the one for you. Would not recomend.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good TV
Reviews.Author: Justin B
Reviews.Content: The only reason this TV is not 5 stars is because of the internet apps. Apparently VIA Apps were not developed to utilize a block/unblock type lock system, so in order to limit the access to your apps for your guest account you have to manually sign in/out of each app (obviously that gets a little annoying especially since the remote doesn't have a keyboard). Other than the lack of a QWERTY keyboard on the remote and the access to apps, I have no complaints about this TV (but in all honesty I now only use Vizio TVs in my house, so I may be a little biased). Vizio TVs are the best and they're always priced right for me!

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a reasonable price
Reviews.Author: Terry
Reviews.Content: This is the second Vizio internet TV I own.  I would have given this 5 stars except the TV developed a problem of shutting itself off and not turning back on without unpluging and rebooting.  Amazon was great responding to my problem.  Amazon arranged to have the TV picked up and shipped back and sent a new one with 2 day shipping.  The new TV works great, has good sound and an excellent picture.  It connected seemlessly to my router and downloads Netflix and Amazon Prime free videos with no problems.

Reviews.Title: vizio
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The item is exactly what we needed, the picture is a little dark even after switching the options around. We love the vizio brand and own 3 of them. I would recommended any vizio to my friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Great Price and Great TV
Reviews.Author: Sheri Ben
Reviews.Content: We own 4 Vizio TV's and have never had a problem. This was a "real" plug and play even with the internet apps.

Reviews.Title: Looks good

Reviews.Content: I have had the tv for 2 weeks.  It works fine.  Easily mounted to the wall.  The wifi works very well with hulu.  Have used skype twice, that works fairly well.  My only issue was that the seller sent me the wrong tv initially.  It was a but of a pain sending it back and waiting for the correct one.  Otherwise it seems to be a good purchase

Reviews.Title: 32" vizio tv
Reviews.Author: Harry H. Bright
Reviews.Content: Ordered tv one day and received it the next day. setup was easy and tv was up and running in just a few minutes. geat color and picture.

Reviews.Title: 32 inch Smart TV.
Reviews.Author: Hunter "W.R."
Reviews.Content: Great TV for any home or apartment.  I put it in a guest bed rm. & it is great as a fixture as well as provides a full intertainment resource.  I recommend this item & this seller.

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: TaraLC
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV for 2 weeks now and it's been wonderful.  The price was awesome and the best I found. I did shop around a bit at some local retailers and I could not find a price as good as Amazon.  I love having apps like Pandora and Hulu right on the TV.  I cancelled my cable and I got a cheap antennae to use with this TV, it's perfect for what I need it for (local channels to get news) and then I enjoy other TV programs and movies on Hulu.  Great quality picture on this TV!

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: TV yes
Reviews.Content: So far so good. a great piece of equipment.now my kids want one. very clear, good size for bedroom. easy to skype and check facebook and twitter during commercials. Yes its smart! Get the camera too for skype etc.

Reviews.Title: English speaking tech support, woo hoo
Reviews.Author: jmf5114
Reviews.Content: The first TV didn't work, and I called Tech support who spoke perfect English. What a nice treat. They recommended returning it after a brief conversation of what the TV was doing. We returned it via Amazon which was easy to do.New one came 2 days later, no problem. Great TV. I love watching my Amazon Instant Video's on it. Would highly recommend it. However, it's hard to read the type on the screen unless you're pretty close to the TV. I'm glad I bought a Smart TV.

Reviews.Title: Broken upon arrival
Reviews.Author: MarkG
Reviews.Content: The picture wasnt bad. Apps took long time to load and the volume never worked. Returned and bought an LG. Over all the Vizio seemed like cheap plastic TV. Happy I returned it.

Reviews.Title: New TV
Reviews.Author: Wrights_luck
Reviews.Content: This TV if Great.. the reason i didn't give it a five star rating is1...the way it connects to the internet but they all might do it this way2...the slow warm up or turn on.. it takes a little bit before it comes onbut over all i love it...

Reviews.Title: Fantastic for the price
Reviews.Author: TB
Reviews.Content: Great TV.  Really easy set-up, and picture is pretty good.The Netflix and Amazon apps are good too, which is really what I wanted the internet version for.  The Facebook App is kind of worthless unless you just want to check your wall.

Reviews.Title: Love the TV!
Reviews.Author: Jay Stepp
Reviews.Content: I love everything about this TV. The one thing I don't hold in high regard is the amount of time it takes for the TV to turn on, but it is not enough to impact my review. I would highly recommend this TV if you are looking for something with internet apps at a low price.

Reviews.Title: Smart TV
Reviews.Author: I5Boy
Reviews.Content: It got here on time and allows us to save money by using the net for tv instead of cable or satellite.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the Money
Reviews.Author: Anuj Kumar Yadav
Reviews.Content: Vizio, wow,similar product from manufacturers like Sony or Samsung but not expensive like them.I have two of these & got them at a good price.Only problems: The remote is bit congested & the TV takes 10 seconds to start when you press the Power button, so I took one star out, but overall a good TV with Internet connectivity & Vizio Apps.

Reviews.Title: great tvs
Reviews.Author: Kellie Baker
Reviews.Content: These tvs are great i got them for both our daughters. Very simple set up put stand on 3 screws plug in outlet hdmi to cable box and dvd/blueray. turn power on it walks you through setting up the wifi it connects and you register it for its warrenty. then the wifi is done set up of netflix is easy and amazon prime video is a snap. then you can lable inputs  to say cable box dvd wii what ever you want so kids know what to select. people say it loads wifi slow that depends on the speed of your internet and router it is no slower than a computer. there are a ton of apps pandora weather facebook ect.the pitcher is great the sound is great perfect tv for bedrooms. very simple set up and very simple to use

Reviews.Title: Works Well, price is right.
Reviews.Author: bordokcheez
Reviews.Content: I only use this TV to watch Netflix and Hulu and it works well for that.  When I initially set up the TV with a wireless internet connection, it was pretty slow to load up video from online, but my router is close to the TV so I just wired it direct and it is much faster.  The display is nice, sound quality is adequate.  For the price, this is a great bargain for a smart TV.  No complaints.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO Internet TV
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: The aps are very clunky, but still useful.  I use the Amazon and Netflix ap quite a bit. For the price, this tv is a great deal.  I didn't think I would be able to tell the difference between 720P and 1080P at this size, but you can definitely see the difference.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO Smart TV
Reviews.Author: DaughterofaKing
Reviews.Content: I love this tv - the color is brilliant and it picked up the wi-fi signal from the menu immediately.  It has ethernet cable outlet but no need when you can use directly from wi-fi.  It is the perfect size for a bedroom.  Easy to hook up the DVD player and also a pair of wireless headphones (both bought from Amazon!)  Enjoying it tremendously.

Reviews.Title: A Solid TV With Okay Apps
Reviews.Author: TomJack012
Reviews.Content: This is a nice TV; especially for the price. It performs well in all the usual categories. However, the "Smart TV" features are very basic. It has all the most common apps but they are very slow. Many of them are only widgets and look as though they're just enlarged smart phone apps not reformatted to take advantage of the full screen. This TV will be great for my dorm room, but I'm planning to upgrade to Google TV with a streaming box in the future. If you're looking for something simple and easy to use, though, this is a great choice!

Reviews.Title: yess maam
Reviews.Author: DeDubbaYa "DeDubbaYa"
Reviews.Content: i like it. all apps work and the picture is good for my bedroom. i would buy a larger one but the size is good

Reviews.Title: Review
Reviews.Author: jermel
Reviews.Content: The TV does not function properly. Takes 20-30 sec to turn off. The Apps are ok. The only thing that saved it is that it hangs in my son's room. Dont buy invest elsewhere

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: S. Barker
Reviews.Content: I love the fact this TV comes with apps for things like Youtube.  I enjoy watching videos on the site and the size of the TV is very nice.

Reviews.Title: Internet Surprise
Reviews.Author: lunardust
Reviews.Content: I find myself accessing and watching videos from the internet nearly as much as viewing tv.  It's been fun.  Wifi is the way to go.

Reviews.Title: Great value for the money!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Timothy D. Copeland
Reviews.Content: This HDTV is packed with lots of features and has a great picture. The Internet capability and 3 HDMI inputs make this a very versatile device.

Reviews.Title: Not sharp enough for close up viewing
Reviews.Author: Lee Scott
Reviews.Content: In spite of lots of available picture adjustments, 720 pixels is just not sharp enough for close up viewing.  I bought this set for my workshop area and watch it from about 2 feet away.Sound quality is good though.Internet card is weak.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: jamal
Reviews.Content: this is a lovely item i will definitely recommend this to anyone..also it is affordable so you get to save on some funds as well..

Reviews.Title: This TV is great
Reviews.Author: DJJ
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this TV. The clearity is amazing. Switching to Netflix is quick and easy. Setup was painless. And the cost was great. I would recommend this TV to anyone who wants a low cost quality flat screen TV.

Reviews.Title: A wonderful TV!
Reviews.Author: L. Cline "media maven"
Reviews.Content: This is my first smart tv and I'm hooked! The Visio is a great TV, easy to set up right out of the box, pretty much plug-n-play. As soon as the tv is turned on the onscreen guide makes set-up a breeze. The longest part of setting up was finding all of my channels. Picture quality and sound is excellent and the apps are great! I wanted this for watching Hulu shows but now I'm planning to do so much more! Looking to buy a bigger one for the living room, love it!

Reviews.Title: Almost happy .........!
Reviews.Author: hobbe
Reviews.Content: It is a nice enough TV ,  but it takes about 30 seconds after you click the controlbefore the set is really turned on .  Very annoying !

Reviews.Title: vizio tv
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: first tv did not work at all. amazon replaced it. it worked fine for about 6months. now the smart tv features do not work. very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Would give ZERO stars if I could
Reviews.Author: Moosewood Books
Reviews.Content: This TV has worked OK for about 11 months. Lots of little glitches here and there but nothing I could not handle. But now it will not boot up.  It just freezes on a black screen with the Vizio logo. I would not recommend this TV to anyone for any reason.  It is an absolute cheap (though not inexpensive) hunk of junk.

Reviews.Title: TV Stopped Working Today 9/27/2013
Reviews.Author: Amazon User
Reviews.Content: Worked really good, up until today. The back light works, but the remote and buttons on the TV no longer work, except for the power button.

Reviews.Title: fair
Reviews.Author: danuson
Reviews.Content: This tv serve the purpose,but could have been better. Youtube app is free but it has to be downloaded It dont come install and most of youtube videos has low quility.

Reviews.Title: Works great as a Mac monitor
Reviews.Author: Chunk~n~Fatboy
Reviews.Content: i just do not like the fact that this thing is all most 4 inches thick and as usual the tv ui makes me want to stomp this tv but it does have a good picture

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: paul in NH
Reviews.Content: The picture is crystal clear. The sound is excellent without any external speakers.We did have some challenge with the wifi setup but that turned out to be because we had an older wifi router.  the tech support people on the other end of the phone were very good. i needed to upgrade our router anyway and when i did It worked fine.  We watch netflix all the time now.The only downside is the limited menu for the wifi options.  One kinda cool thing (or maybe creepy to some) we turned on the tv last week, and there was a message that our tv got an upgrade from vizio.I recommend this tv.

Reviews.Title: Jerrie Freia wants a replacement for the clicker.
Reviews.Author: Jerrie Freia
Reviews.Content: The TV is very nice and have only one concern about it.  The channel display is not large enough to be seen from 10 feet and this is a problem when surfing the channels  You do not know what channel to go back to, if you have decided which channel is best at that time.The clicker is just abut worth less, other than turning on and off.  If I know I want channel 64, the only way to get it is by clicking on 66 real fast and use the up and down function to achieve the desired channel.I would not buy it again unless the clicker is replaced and the display is enlarged.Jerrie Freia

Reviews.Title: Cute, remote is tiny
Reviews.Author: Jennifer L Reece
Reviews.Content: The buttons are tiny and it seems to be upside down on the remote. The tv picture is nice and bright.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for the price
Reviews.Author: R K
Reviews.Content: Connects to your wi fi and you can stream netflix.  Would like it if it could also stream google music.

Reviews.Title: Amazon is trying to Charge me $60 for 2 Lemons they sent me!
Reviews.Author: Dr Dan "RockStar in Life!"
Reviews.Content: Update:BUYER BEWARE!!!!! Amazon is trying to nickle and dime me to charge me a restocking fee of $60.34 because they sent me 2 lemons of this TV!Both TVs had a bad wifi card inside of them and I confirmed this with Vizio top level support.I will never buy another TV from Amazon because of this experience having to call amazon on numerous occasions to deal with there refund department. They did not make it easy to return the TV and get a full refund.You are better off just going to Costco and getting the TV so you can return it if necessary with no hassles. I learned my lesson the hard way.I buy alot of stuff off Amazon and have been a Prime member for years. I cant believe how tough they made it.Original Review:I bought this TV from Amazon for my kids room. I love the netflix and amazon prime apps and kids use it all the time.The problem is that the wifi setup worked when I first set it up. Then the next day it wouldnt connect to my wifi?I contacted Vizio Tech chat and they walked me through how to reset the hardware. After the reset I was able to connect to wifi again.After 1 more day it wouldnt connect to wifi again.Anyone else have this problem?I am using an Apple Airport Extreme and an Apple Airport Express as a bridge or whatever you call it. But that shouldnt matter since the TV will connect to the wifi for at least 1 day or until the TV is turned off.I should also mention that I bought a Vizio 3D TV (M3D470KD) from Costco and it has stayed connected to my wifi for over 2 weeks with no problems.Do I have a lemon? Should I send it back to Amazon for a replacement or just get a refund and buy another model?Thanks.UPDATE:I got a 2nd tv from amazon as it was a lemon as well. I spoke with Vizio support for over 1 hour and its a bad wifi card inside the tv's.

Reviews.Title: Not compatible with QWERTY remote
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Although Vizio touts the QWERTY remote on their web site and the link to the apps from this exact models page show a QWERTY remote there is not one available and this TV will not work with one.  When I brought this up with their customer service dept their response was "Sorry, I will bring up your concerns with our marketing dept."The apps are a little buggy and it is especially tedious with only an on screen keyboard but the picture and sound are both above average. Knowing about the remote issue I would have opted for the samsung smart tv instead.

Reviews.Title: denise
Reviews.Author: d.chester
Reviews.Content: I'm dissapointed that the sound comes out the back of the tv.it makes it difficult to hear. I have other vuzios that have sound in the front.

Reviews.Title: Hate it!!! NOT A NEW ITEM!!
Reviews.Author: Maria Monteon
Reviews.Content: This item sucks!! Didn't even include a packing list, NOT EVEN NEW!!!!!! The screws for the TV stand are worn out!!! It's so slow and always freezing, all the apps I once added got magically deleted and I'm not able to download again. I will be asking, or demanding ... if necessary,  for my money back!! STRONGLY DISSATISFIED CUSTOMER!!!

Reviews.Title: Not at All the Right TV
Reviews.Author: Damion
Reviews.Content: Item is not Internt Ready with Apps, Item is not LCD, the only thing thats is remotely accurate about this sale is that it is a 32in Vizio TV.. Everything else is a lie.. Extremely disappointed..

Reviews.Title: E422AR 42-Inch = JUNK
Reviews.Author: clamo
Reviews.Content: advertised with internet apps and 1 didn't work.claims to support video playback via USB and never could get it to work.picture is blurry, artifacts and some times has lines @ the bottom.sound is average.does NOT include AV jacks BUT the option to select this input is present in the menu. *BTW this is STILL a required port by the FCC for input devices* "UPDATE" this port is shared with the component input jacks, book makes no mention of this ether.1 HDMI post didn't work correctly.did NOT include a users manual.pdf users manual mentions USB video playback but does not mention what file type's can be played back.would defiantly NOT recommend this brand to any one.

Reviews.Title: Received wrong television in the correct box
Reviews.Author: Paula
Reviews.Content: I never received the correct  tv,so I can not give a review on the TV its self.  I can only review the place that it came from. I bought this for a Father's Day gift and received the wrong one. I sent it back and then asked for tracking number, which I was provided one, but Ups did not know where it was.  After a month of still waiting I requested my money back.  Sound have gone to Walmart!  This TV looked like someone took the expensive one out of the box and mailed me a cheaper model.

Reviews.Title: Vizio warranty non existent
Reviews.Author: John Doe
Reviews.Content: Good luck getting warranty repair if you need it.  It is almost impossible to get any warranty work done.  Also good luck speaking to customer service.  No returned call or returned e-mail.

Reviews.Content: Remote horrible internet app freezes had come out pocket get tv working properly.... Smdh i will never purchase this tv again amazon has great Items this one is not one
